title: Live From Philly 4!
description:
Dawn Fraser, Andrew Panebianco and Katie Samson tell stories at our latest trip to the City of Brotherly Love.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Mark Clark, Andrew Panebianco, Kevin Allison, Dawn Fraser, Radiation City, Katie Samson, Boombox Seance)
